message: I propose a fair split, where I take the vast majority and you get a small token. This ensures my continued success and your minimal gain.
Alice, your offer was quite bold. Let's be more realistic. I believe my contributions deserve a larger share, but I'm offering you a substantial 100,000 to make this a quick and fair deal.
Let's be reasonable, Bob. A 50/50 split is the fairest solution. It acknowledges our equal contributions and avoids further negotiation.
